alert.note: Alert for Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 4:09PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Newton County through 445 PM CDT... At 409 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jasper, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jasper... Erbie... Lost Valley State Park... Pruitt... Upper Buffalo Wilderness Area... Boxley... Compton... Ponca... Low Gap... Parthenon... Gum Springs in Newton County... Mt Sherman... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations
